posts.title: Welcome to the blog
posts.body: Alright then gang, I've finished uploading all the new course content (179 new lectures in total) which are meant to completely replace the old course content. It may take a few hours or so to be fully updated on the course page, before you see it.

posts.title: Top 5 CSS tips
posts.body: Like I said, the new content is meant to completely replace the old content. So if you're brand new to the course, you should probably start at the very beginning. If you're mid-way through the old content already, you can still carry on with it - I've kept it all up at the end of the course and marked it as. It will stay here for about 3 weeks before I remove it and put it on my YouTube channel.

posts.title: Build Web Apps with Vue JS 3 & Firebase
posts.body: Over the last couple of months I've been working on some big updates (a whole rewrite, in fact) for this course, which will contain the latest Vue 3 features (including a lot of hands-on practise with the composition API). It will also adopt the latest approach for setting up firebase with front-end applications (plus a new section on firebase storage for file uploads too).
